game.ai

Class Sandbox

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.ai.AI
      • game.ai.Sandbox

  • public final class Sandbox
extends AI
    The Sandbox AI, i.e., the "Easy" AI. Fires at random positions.
    Author:
    blackk100

    • Method Detail

      • fire

        public int[] fire()
        Function for the AI to fire at the player's ships. The coordinates are always (psuedo-)randomly generated.
        Overrides:
        fire in class AI
        Returns:
        an integer array. The 1st value is the x-Coordinate. The 2nd value is the Y-Coordinate.
